badges.description: Display information about badges and how they work.
badges.name: badges

help.description: Display the list of available commands or detailed information on a command.
help.name: help

commandName.description: The command to display information about.
commandName.name: command

idea.description: Send a suggestion to improve the game.
idea.name: idea

rank.description: The rank of the player whose inventory should be displayed.
rank.name: rank

user.description: The user whose inventory should be displayed.
user.name: user

invite.description: Add the bot to your server.
invite.name: invitecrownicles

language.description: Change the bot's language for your future interactions.
language.name: language

ping.description: Display the bot's latency and allow the player to check whether the bot is online.
ping.name: ping

pet.description: Displays information about the pet of a player.
pet.name: pet

rank.description: The rank of the player whose pet should be displayed.
rank.name: rank

user.description: The user whose pet should be displayed.
user.name: user

petNick.description: Give a nickname to your pet.
petNick.name: petnickname

nickname.description: The nickname you want to give your pet. (Leave blank to delete the nickname)
nickname.name: nickname

guildInvite.description: Invite a new member in your guild.
guildInvite.name: guildinvite

rank.description: The rank of the player whose guild you want to display.
rank.name: rank

user.description: The user whose guild should be displayed.
user.name: user

guildName.description: The name of the guild that should be displayed.
guildName.name: guild

profile.description: Displays the profile of a player.
profile.name: profile

rank.description: The rank of the player whose profile you want to display.
rank.name: rank

user.description: The player whose profile you want to display.
user.name: user

report.description: Get a report on your character's situation.
report.name: report

test.description: Cheat command for testers (TEST MODE ONLY).
test.name: test

update.description: Display the current version of the bot.
update.name: update

vote.description: Displays the link to vote for the bot.
vote.name: vote

map.description: Show map to indicate where you're going.
map.name: map

classesInfo.description: Display information on the classes selectable for your character.
classesInfo.name: classesinfo

toggle.description: Enable or disable notifications of a specific type.
toggle.name: toggle

maintenance.description: Set the bot in maintenance mode.
maintenance.name: maintenance

save.description: Save the maintenance mode to the configuration file.
save.name: save

missions.description: List the missions of a player.
missions.name: missions

rank.description: The rank of the player whose missions will be displayed.
rank.name: rank

user.description: The user whose missions will be displayed.
user.name: user

guildKick.description: Kick a player from the guild.
guildKick.name: guildkick

rank.description: The rank of the player who must be kicked from the guild.
rank.name: rank

user.description: The user who must be kicked from the guild.
user.name: user

guildElder.description: Promote a guild member to elder.
guildElder.name: guildelder

user.description: The user who will be promoted as an elder.
user.name: user

guildElderRemove.description: Demote the elder of the guild.
guildElderRemove.name: guildelderremove

daily.description: Use your equipped item to get a daily bonus.
daily.name: dailybonus

rank.description: The rank of the player who must be unlocked.
rank.name: rank

user.description: The user who must be unlocked.
user.name: user

glory.description: Display player rankings according to glory.
glory.name: glory

guild.description: Display guild rankings based on points.
guild.name: guild

timing.description: The timing of the displayed ranking (All time by default).
timing.name: timing

page.description: The page of the ranking to display.
page.name: page

switch.name: switch
switch.description: Switch the active item with one of the items in your item stock.

force.name: force
force.description: If true, skips the validation phase if you are really sure you want to drink the potion.

petSell.name: petsell
petSell.description: Sell a pet to another player.

user.name: user
user.description: The player to whom the pet will be sold.

petTransfer.name: pettransfer
petTransfer.description: Transfer a pet from or to the guild shelter.

leagueReward.name: leaguebonus
leagueReward.description: Get the reward linked to your league.

guildStorage.name: guildstorage
guildStorage.description: Display the contents of the guild warehouse.

joinBoat.name: joinboat
joinBoat.description: Join the boat if a member of your guild is on it.

giveBadge.name: givebadge
giveBadge.description: Give a badge to a player.

user.name: user
user.description: The user who will receive the badge.

fightHistory.name: fighthistory
fightHistory.description: Display the history of your fights.
